body:
Hello All,

I have compiled and installed the Radiance 3.7 (downloaded August 2,
2005) under Knoppix 3.9 and everything compiled and played nicely Greg.

One small backwater that has missed the general name change is the obj
directory. There are many references to the old 'rview' program which
need changing to 'rvu' in the next release as this directory is a good
source of information to new users.


Regards

Terry Mc Minn
Faculty of Built Environment, Art and Design
Curtin University of Technology
GPO Box U 1987 Perth 6845
Western Australia
Email: T.Mcminn@curtin.edu.au
CRICOS Provider Code: 00301J
subject: [Radiance-general] RE: Radiance 3.7 obj and rview
